text: Saetgang Station is a train station of Seoul Subway Line 9, located in Yeouido, Seoul, South Korea. == History == * September 18, 2008 : Station name decidedSeoul Announcements 2008-317 , 2008-9-18. * July 24, 2009 : Opened with opening of Seoul Subway Line 9 Gaehwa - Sinnonhyeon == Station structure == Station has 2 side platforms, 4 tracks; two tracks are for passing express train. As local(All stop) train stops at platform, express train passes by using the passing track. === Platform === Yeouido ↑ Down Up ↓ Noryangjin Upward For Gimpo International AirportGaehwa Downward For SinnonhyeonSports Complex == Near Saetgang Station == * Ankara Park * Daebang Station * Saetgang * 63 Building == Passenger count == Data of 2009 is calculated from July 24 (First Opened) ~ December 31. Line People per day (people/day) References 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 Line 9 Get on 3,468 4,378 4,622 5,280 5,606 5,624 5,290 Line 9 Get off 3,286 4,421 4,700 5,414 5,815 5,807 5,547 == References == Category:Railway stations in South Korea
title: Saetgang Station
